title: Watch and Clock Repairers
descr: Repair, clean, and adjust mechanisms of timing instruments, such as watches and clocks. Includes watchmakers, watch technicians, and mechanical timepiece repairers.
alt_titles: Antique Clock Repairer, Dial Printer, Electric Clock Mechanic, Watch Mechanic, Horologist, Pallet Inspector, Pallet Repairer, Pallet Stone Inserter, Pallet Stone Positioner, Repair Technician, Screwhead Polisher, Time Clock Inspector, Antique Clocks Repairer, Time Clock Mechanic, Time Piece Repairer, Watch and Clock Repairer, Watch Caser, Caser, Watch Estimator, Watch Repair Person, Watch Repair Technician, Watch Repairer, Clock Mechanic, Watch Technician (Watch Tech), Watchmaker, Auto Clocks Repairer, Clock Repair Technician, Clock Repairer, Clocksmith, Chronometer Repairer, Crowner
experience: Previous work-related skill, knowledge, or experience is required for these occupations. For example, an electrician must have completed three or four years of apprenticeship or several years of vocational training, and often must have passed a licensing exam, in order to perform the job.
education: Most occupations in this zone require training in vocational schools, related on-the-job experience, or an associate's degree.
job_training: Employees in these occupations usually need one or two years of training involving both on-the-job experience and informal training with experienced workers. A recognized apprenticeship program may be associated with these occupations.
example: These occupations usually involve using communication and organizational skills to coordinate, supervise, manage, or train others to accomplish goals. Examples include hydroelectric production managers, desktop publishers, electricians, agricultural technicians, barbers, court reporters and simultaneous captioners, and medical assistants.
svp_desc: Individuals workers typically need anywhere from between 1 and 2 years- up to 4 years- to learn the techniques, acquire the information, and develop the facility needed for average performance in specific situations.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Repair or replace broken, damaged, or worn parts on timepieces, using lathes, drill presses, and hand tools.
work_tasks.descr: Repair or replace broken, damaged, or worn parts on timepieces, using lathes, drill presses, and hand tools.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Clean, rinse, and dry timepiece parts, using solutions and ultrasonic or mechanical watch-cleaning machines.
work_tasks.descr: Clean, rinse, and dry timepiece parts, using solutions and ultrasonic or mechanical watch-cleaning machines.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Disassemble timepieces and inspect them for defective, worn, misaligned, or rusty parts, using loupes.
work_tasks.descr: Disassemble timepieces and inspect them for defective, worn, misaligned, or rusty parts, using loupes.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Reassemble timepieces, replacing glass faces and batteries, before returning them to customers.
work_tasks.descr: Reassemble timepieces, replacing glass faces and batteries, before returning them to customers.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Test timepiece accuracy and performance, using meters and other electronic instruments.
work_tasks.descr: Test timepiece accuracy and performance, using meters and other electronic instruments.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Fabricate parts for watches and clocks, using small lathes and other machines.
work_tasks.descr: Fabricate parts for watches and clocks, using small lathes and other machines.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Estimate repair costs and timepiece values.
work_tasks.descr: Estimate repair costs and timepiece values.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Perform regular adjustment and maintenance on timepieces, watch cases, and watch bands.
work_tasks.descr: Perform regular adjustment and maintenance on timepieces, watch cases, and watch bands.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Adjust timing regulators, using truing calipers, watch-rate recorders, and tweezers.
work_tasks.descr: Adjust timing regulators, using truing calipers, watch-rate recorders, and tweezers.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Record quantities and types of timepieces repaired, serial and model numbers of items, work performed, and charges for repairs.
work_tasks.descr: Record quantities and types of timepieces repaired, serial and model numbers of items, work performed, and charges for repairs.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Gather information from customers about a timepiece's problems and its service history.
work_tasks.descr: Gather information from customers about a timepiece's problems and its service history.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Test and replace batteries and other electronic components.
work_tasks.descr: Test and replace batteries and other electronic components.

work_tasks.title: Watch and Clock Repairers
work_tasks.task: Order supplies, including replacement parts, for timing instruments.
work_tasks.descr: Order supplies, including replacement parts, for timing instruments.

The things to be compared may be presented at the same time or one after the other. This ability also includes comparing a presented object with a remembered object.
